duties_responsibilities.duty: Track incoming and finished goods materials, packaging supplies, etc. in the warehousing and distribution of customer products.
Develop and maintain inventory control systems to meet facility needs.
Manage the facility cycle count program and the inventory recoup/repack/return/recycle program.
Provide floor support to Operations Supervisors and hourly associates regarding inventory issues.
Track day-to-day facility inventory costs and communicate results to appropriate team members.
Support facility Key Performance Indicators (KPI) to meet established goals, including GMP, safety, quality, productivity, sanitation, and maintenance.
Provide office support and execute the hold process for local site.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree preferred in logistics, supply chain, or related field
